ozpIwc.policyAuth.points.utils Class

Defined in: src\js\bus\policyAuth\points\utils.js:10
Module: ozpIwc.policyAuth.points
Parent Module: ozpIwc.policyAuth

A static collection of utility methods for the ozpIwc.policyAuth.points namespace.

  • Index
  • Methods

Item Index

Methods

  • formatAction static
  • formatAttribute static
  • formatAttributes static
  • formatCategories static
  • formatCategory static
  • formatRequest static

Methods

formatAction

(
  • action
)
Object static

Defined in src\js\bus\policyAuth\points\utils.js:110

Formats an action to be used by a request or policy. Actions are not gathered from the Policy Information Point. Rather they are string values explaining the operation to be permitted. To comply with XACML, these strings are wrapped in objects for easier comparison

Parameters:

  • action String | Object | Array

Returns:

Object:

An object of formatted actions indexed by the ozp action id ozp:action:id. An example output for actions ['read','write'] is as follows:

 {
     'ozp:iwc:action': {
         <attributeValue>: ['read', 'write']
     }
 }

formatAttribute

(
  • attribute
  • [pip]
)
ozpIwc.util.AsyncAction static

Defined in src\js\bus\policyAuth\points\utils.js:52

Takes a URN, array of urns, object, array of objects, or array of any combination and fetches/formats to the necessary structure to be used by a request of policy's category object.

Parameters:

  • attribute String | Object | Array

    The attribute to format

  • [pip] ozpIwc.policyAuth.points.PIP optional

    Policy information point, uses ozpIwc.authorization.pip by default.

Returns:

ozpIwc.util.AsyncAction:

returns an async action that will resolve with an object of the formatted attributes. each attribute is ID indexed in the object, such that the formatting of id ozp:iwc:node which has attributes a and bwould resolve as follows:

 {
     'ozp:iwc:node': {
         <attributeValue>: ['a','b']
     }
 }

formatAttributes

(
  • attributes
  • [pip]
)
ozpIwc.util.AsyncAction static

Defined in src\js\bus\policyAuth\points\utils.js:18

Parameters:

  • attributes Array
  • [pip] ozpIwc.policyAuth.points.PIP optional

Returns:

ozpIwc.util.AsyncAction:

formatCategories

(
  • categoryObj
  • [categoryObj[<categoryId>]]
  • [pip]
)
ozpIwc.util.AsyncAction static

Defined in src\js\bus\policyAuth\points\utils.js:298

Category context handling for policy objects. Takes object key-indexed categories for a policy and returns an object key-indexed listing of formatted. Each category is keyed by its XACML URN. currently only subject,resource, and action categories are supported.

Parameters:

  • categoryObj Object

    An object of categories to format.

  • [categoryObj[<categoryId>]] Object | String | Array optional

    A category to format

  • [pip] ozpIwc.policyAuth.points.PIP optional

    custom policy information point for attribute gathering.

Returns:

ozpIwc.util.AsyncAction:

will resolve an object of categories be structured as so:

{
  <categoryId> : {
     <AttributeId>:{
         <attributeValue> : Array<Primitive>
     },
     <AttributeId>:{
         <attributeValue> : Array<Primitive>
     }
  },
  <categoryId>: {...},
  ...
}

formatCategory

(
  • category
  • categoryId
  • [pip]
)
ozpIwc.util.AsyncAction static

Defined in src\js\bus\policyAuth\points\utils.js:257

Formats a category object. If needed the attribute data is gathered from the PIP.

Parameters:

  • category String | Array | Object

    the category (subject,resource,action) to format

  • categoryId String

    the category name used to map to its corresponding attributeId (see PDP.mappedID)

  • [pip] ozpIwc.policyAuth.points.PIP optional

    custom policy information point for attribute gathering.

Returns:

ozpIwc.util.AsyncAction:

will resolve with a category object formatted as so:

 {
     <AttributeId>: {
         <attributeValue>: {Array<Primative>}
     }
 }

formatRequest

(
  • request
  • [pip]
)
ozpIwc.util.AsyncAction static

Defined in src\js\bus\policyAuth\points\utils.js:176

Takes a request object and applies any context needed from the PIP.

Parameters:

  • request Object
    • subject String | Array | Object

      URN(s) of attribute to gather, or formatted subject object

    • resource String | ArrayObject

      URN(s) of attribute to gather, or formatted resource object

    • action String | ArrayObject

      URN(s) of attribute to gather, or formatted action object

    • combiningAlgorithm String

      URN of combining algorithm

    • policies Array

      either a URN or a formatted policy

  • [pip] ozpIwc.policyAuth.points.PIP optional

    custom policy information point for attribute gathering.

Returns:

ozpIwc.util.AsyncAction:

will resolve when all attribute formatting completes. The resolution will pass a formatted structured as so:

 {
     'category':{
         'subject': {
             <AttributeId>: {
                 <AttributeValue>: Array<Primitive>
             }
         },
         'resource': {
             <AttributeId>: {
                 <AttributeValue>: Array<Primitive>
             }
         },
         'action': {
             "ozp:iwc:action": {
                 "attributeValues": Array<String>
             }
         }
     },
     'combiningAlgorithm': request.combiningAlgorithm,
     'policies': request.policies
 }
